dtliExcerpt: I would advise them all to rush to the Ethel Barrymore Theatre, where Peter Morgan’s “Patriots” is offering one of the most absorbing accounts of political intrigue I’ve ever seen on a Broadway stage.

one of the most absorbing accounts of political intrigue I've ever seen on a Broadway stage
